channel.title: Spawning in items and making shops
channel.description: hey guys i thought i would start a new hobby making an rsps so i downloaded the zenithscape client and server i want a spawn server so i dont know how to spawn in things though and when i went into the shop file there are no prices only quantity and item id so can someone help me with these two prblmes again i am useing zenithscape

item.title: Spawning in items and making shops
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark

dd123c5:

thats what i need thow is to change shop prices and how do i make myself max level

Messaged you the help. Let me know in PM or here if you need anything else.

item.title: Spawning in items and making shops
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

I’ve told you how to give yourself spawn rights.

Go to src -> com -> rs -> game -> player -> content -> commands.java

Search

Make sure the line of code that has that, says:

Then make sure you have player rights 7 by;

Going to src -> com -> rs -> game -> player -> player.java

Now search:

Change:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("King_Zenith")) { rights = 7; }

To:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Username")) { rights = 7; }

And you don’t change shop prices in unpackedShops.

Read full topic
